statements: SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading_value FROM sensors ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensors WHERE location='Living Room' AND reading_value > 50
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE reading_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, reading_value FROM sensors WHERE location='Garage' ORDER BY sensor_id LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY reading_time ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp, maintenance_type FROM sensor_data JOIN maintenance_log ON sensor_data.sensor_id = maintenance_log.sensor_id ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'H%';
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM device_info WHERE location = 'Room A' AND status = 'Active'
SELECT device_id, location, installation_date FROM device_info ORDER BY installation_date ASC
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM device_info WHERE status = 'active' AND location LIKE '%room%'
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT d.device_name, m.maintenance_date, m.technician_name FROM device_info d INNER JOIN maintenance_records m ON d.device_id = m.device_id WHERE m.maintenance_type = 'scheduled' ORDER BY m.maintenance_date ASC
SELECT d.device_name, d.location, m.maintenance_type FROM device_info d LEFT JOIN maintenance_records m ON d.device_id = m.device_id WHERE m.record_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 50
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM SensorStatus WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT AVG(confidence_level) AS avg_confidence FROM PredictiveAnalysis
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_type, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT sensor_id, prediction, AVG(confidence_level) AS avg_confidence FROM PredictiveAnalysis GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_confidence > 0.8
SELECT sensor_id, status, last_updated FROM SensorStatus INNER JOIN SensorData ON SensorStatus.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_reading > 50;
SELECT machine_name, status FROM machine_status ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM maintenance_logs WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, frequency FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE frequency <= 30;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_reading, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT machine_name, status FROM machine_status WHERE status='error' OR status='warning';
SELECT machine_type, COUNT(*) AS total_machines FROM machine_status GROUP BY machine_type;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE machine_id IN (SELECT machine_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE frequency > 6);
